subject: Re: Kodilo - Add SOL2 to range menu

full_threads.body:
Hi Sarah,

Sure, I’ve attached the screenshot. Please click on "Show Advanced Settings," and the list should appear.

Let me know if you need further assistance!

Hi Joel

Thanks very helpful.

On the edit page for the Ranges I can not see where I can exclude a range?

I can not locate Exclude Terms

Can you please show me where this is located.

Thanks very much

Sarah

Hi Sarah,

I hope you're doing well.

We've made some updates to the sidebar filter—you'll now be able to see SOL2 on the shop page:
https://kodilo.com.au/shop/

If you'd like to exclude a specific range, you can do so here:
Admin – Facet Settings
Then scroll down to the Exclude Terms section to make your adjustments.
Let me know if you have any questions or need a hand with anything!

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Joel Maligalig

Sarah
